attributes.action: The government should not even consider a second referendum.
attributes.additional_details: If the remain voters won then we would of had to just accept the result but because it's the other way around they are sulking like little kids and using anything they can to make us look stupid. David Cameron's own words on his Facebook when someone ast if there would be more in the future he said "This is a referendum not a neverendum" and our vote should remain end of not causing even more stress for the UK people who won there vote fair and square!
attributes.background: If they do a second referendum just because it didn't with by 60% is a joke when the votes are so large this could go on forever and this would never of happened if it was other way around.
